title: BEST OF- Oct 01, 2020
itunes:title: BEST OF- Oct 01, 2020
description:
On Today's episode of the DP Show, Dan and the guys recap last night's dominant performance by the Lakers in Game 1 of the NBA finals. Which Role Play surprised them most? We're joined by NBC's Peter King and Pro Football Focus Senior Analyst Steve Palazzolo. Plus. Paulie unleashing his highly anticipated punting idea.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
